question: In which season did Bursaspor win the Süper Lig championship?
asked_question_translated: V kateri sezoni je Bursaspor osvojil naslov prvaka Süper Lig?
answer: Bursaspor je osvojil naslov prvaka Süper Lig v sezoni 2009–2010.
answer_translated_eng: Bursaspor won the Süper Lig title in 2009-2010.
